title: 4 unnessery towers, which make the game less fun to play.
body:
I dont like the new towers !!!

I mean i really like to play 3 v 3 and i played the old map alot. The new changes are mostly good, especially the new vilemaw. The only change i dont like are the 4 new towers. The make the lane more boring cause you cant built up huge minions waves and freezing is also very hard to do now. In addition the number of lane kills is lower cause the lane is shorter and there is less room for extended trades or chasing Also the ability of roaming is less impactfull and the laners will mostly stick on their lanes cause its easily pushed up and you lose alot of farm then. This makes the game more onesided and there are less 3 man ganks etc. and it lowers the teamcooperation in the early stages. Also ganking got alot harder since the tower is so near to the laner now. Most of the times i dont gank, instead i wait for the other jungler to face check my bush by trying to gank from behind and kill him with the assistnce of my team, which is closer, or make a countergank since its safer and gains alot more.

Tl:Dr:
The new towers prevent ganking and make it heavier and the lanes are more boring now. Therefor there is less teamplay and more farming/laning.
